# WebSocket

**Structure**

The system definition of the WebSocket protocol.

## Declaration

```swift
struct WebSocket
```

## Overview

Can be used to add WebSocket to a protocol stack and configure its options.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Create an instance of the WebSocket protocol.
- **init(_:)**: Create an instance of the WebSocket protocol.

## Instance Methods

- **additionalHeaders(_:)**: Set additional HTTP header fields to be sent by the client during the WebSocket handshake.
- **autoReplyPing(_:)**: Configure the WebSocket protocol to automatically reply to pings.
- **maximumMessageSize(_:)**: Set the maximum allowed message size to be received by the WebSocket connection.
- **skipHandshake(_:)**: Configure the WebSocket protocol to skip the opening handshake and begin framing data as soon as the underlying connection is established.
- **subprotocols(_:)**: Set the list of supported application protocols that will be presented to a WebSocket server during connection establishment.

## Conforms To

- MessageProtocol
- NetworkProtocolOptions
- OneToOneProtocol
